channel.title: Boolean Operators :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Python also includes several operators that can be applied to one or two Boolean values. These operators make up the basis of Boolean logic, and allow us to construct complex expressions of Boolean values. Letâ€™s quickly review the three basic Boolean operators present in Python. And Operator In Python, we use the keyword and to perform the Boolean and operation. This operator will return True if both input values are also True, otherwise it will return False.
